section.title: Managing and Monitoring Diameter Network Peers
View Diameter Network Peer Summary
section.para: In the top, at the summary section the Type and State of the &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Network Peer is shown. Also, recent measurements, Out of Bound metrics and Alerts can be seen in a summary view.

section.title: Monitor Diameter Network Peer Measurements and Availability over time
section.para: By accessing the MONITOR tab it's possible to see a set of graphs showing measurements regarding Network Peer as well as a graph showing the availability of the Diameter Network Peer over time.

section.para: It is also possible to see the data in a table, by accessing the TABLES option under MONITOR tab.
Configuration of the interval between data collection, and disable/enable certain metrics is possible, in the SCHEDULES option under MONITOR tab.

important.title: Configuration of Network Peers not supported
important.para: At the moment, it's not possible to configure Network Peers in runtime.
